mapper.select: select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales from goods order by good_sales
mapper.insert: insert into good (good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales) values (#{goodName},#{goodPrice},#{goodCategory},#{goodIntroduction},#{goodSales})
mapper.update: update good set good_name = #{goodName} where id = #{id}
update good set good_price = #{goodPrice} where id = #{id}
